name: ACG_final_1
condition: C.harem >= 30 and A.harem >= 30 and G.harem >= 30 and is_after_completion(['ACG_duo_9'], 2)

name: ACG_duo_10
condition: C.harem >= 27 and A.harem >= 27 and G.harem >= 27 and is_after_completion(['ACG_duo_9'], 2)

name: CDE_final
condition: C.harem >= 30 and D.harem >= 25 and E.harem >= 25 and is_after_completion(['CE_duo_2'], 2)

name: Final_final
condition: is_after_completion(['CDE_final'], 2) and is_after_completion(['B_final_2'], 2) and is_after_completion(['ACG_final_1'], 2) and is_after_completion(['F_love_10'], 2)
